KnightlyVirtue.name: Knightly Virtue
KnightlyVirtue.description: The knight has one of the following traits, depending on the court it serves:

Lance.name: Lance
Lance.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The nightmare haunt has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Somnophage.name: Somnophage
Somnophage.description: At the start of its turn, the nightmare haunt gains a number of temporary hit points equal to 5 times the number of unconscious creatures within 30 feet of itself.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The nightmare haunt makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage.

TendrilsofSlumber{@recharge5}.name: TendrilsofSlumber{@recharge5}
TendrilsofSlumber{@recharge5}.description: The nightmare haunt creates spectral tendrils that cover the ground in a 20-foot square that it can see within 30 feet of itself for 1 minute or until it uses this action again. When a creature other than the nightmare haunt enters the affected area for the first time or starts its turn there, the creature must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or take 11 (2d10) necrotic damage and have the restrained condition. The affected ground is also considered difficult terrain for creatures other than the nightmare haunt for the duration of its effect.

SpeakwithRats.name: Speak with Rats
SpeakwithRats.description: The ogre can verbally communicate simple concepts to ordinary rats and giant rats.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ogre makes two Club attacks, two Rat-Tail Whip attacks, or one of each.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Rat-TailWhip.name: Rat-TailWhip
Rat-TailWhip.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is pulled 5 feet toward the ogre.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The werefox makes two Bite attacks, two Lance attacks, or one Bite attack and one Lance attack.

Bite(FoxorHybridFormOnly).name: Bite(FoxorHybridFormOnly)
Bite(FoxorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage. If the werefox moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit and the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

Lance(ElforHybridFormOnly).name: Lance(ElforHybridFormOnly)
Lance(ElforHybridFormOnly).description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage.

EntanglingArrow(ElforHybridFormOnly).name: EntanglingArrow(ElforHybridFormOnly)

value.value: Entangling Arrow (Elf or Hybrid Form Only)

EntanglingArrow(ElforHybridFormOnly).description: rw 5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or have the restrained condition until the start of the werefox's next turn.

value.condition: (in elf form; 40 ft. in fox and hybrid form)

BeastSpeech.name: Beast Speech
BeastSpeech.description: The sewer king can comprehend and verbally communicate with any Beast.

RancidBite.name: RancidBite
RancidBite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition until the start of the sewer king's next turn.

SummonSwarm(1/Day).name: SummonSwarm(1/Day)
SummonSwarm(1/Day).description: The sewer king chitters and summons a swarm of rats to its aid. The swarm appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of the sewer king that the sewer king can see. It acts as the sewer king's ally, obeys the sewer king's commands, and takes its turn immediately after the sewer king's. The swarm remains until it dies, the sewer king dies, or until the sewer king dismisses it as an action.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The hydra can breathe air and water.

MultipleHeads.name: Multiple Heads
MultipleHeads.description: The hydra has five heads. Whenever the hydra takes 30 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra dies.

ReactiveHeads.name: Reactive Heads
ReactiveHeads.description: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

Wakeful.name: Wakeful
Wakeful.description: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hydra makes as many Bite attacks as it has heads.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

ShellDefense.name: ShellDefense
ShellDefense.description: The hydra withdraws its limbs and heads into its shell. Until it emerges as a bonus action, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the hydra has the prone condition, its speed is 0 and can't increase, its heads can't die, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it can't take any other actions or reactions.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the specter fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The specter has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The specter uses Mournful Keening if available, then makes one Hooves attack and one Reaping Scythe attack.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 28 (8d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

MournfulKeening{@recharge}.name: MournfulKeening{@recharge}
MournfulKeening{@recharge}.description: The specter utters a keening wail, calling to those close to death. Each non-Undead creature within 120 feet of the specter must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature hears the wail and is marked for death.

ReapingScythe.name: ReapingScythe
ReapingScythe.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (1d12 + 6) slashing damage plus 28 (8d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain a level of exhaustion.

Caramelization.name: Caramelization
Caramelization.description: If the horror takes fire damage, it releases a sweet, mesmerizing scent. Each creature within 30 feet of the horror must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or have the charmed condition. A charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The horror has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The horror makes one Bite attack and two Candy Cane attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) acid damage.

CandyCane.name: CandyCane
CandyCane.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the horror can choose to deal no damage; instead, the target has the prone condition, and the horror can pull the target up to 5 feet toward itself.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the hart fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hart makes a Lightning Antlers attack and a Thunder Hooves attack.

LightningAntlers.name: LightningAntlers
LightningAntlers.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition until the start of the hart's next turn.

ThunderHooves.name: ThunderHooves
ThunderHooves.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) thunder damage.

PlantCamouflage.name: Plant Camouflage
PlantCamouflage.description: The treefolk has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in forest terrain.

TreeStride.name: Tree Stride
TreeStride.description: Once on each of its turns, the treefolk can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one living tree within 5 feet of itself and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of itself that it can see, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be at least as large as the treefolk.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The treefolk makes two Crushing Vine attacks, two Nightshade Bolt attacks, or one of each.

CrushingVine.name: CrushingVine
CrushingVine.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). While grappled, the creature also has the restrained condition. The treefolk can grapple up to six creatures this way.

NightshadeBolt.name: NightshadeBolt
NightshadeBolt.description: rs 9 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 33 (6d10) poison damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the witchkite fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The witchkite makes two Rend attacks and uses Malevolent Flare once.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage.

MalevolentFlare.name: MalevolentFlare
MalevolentFlare.description: The witchkite spits magical, green-tinged flame at one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 (5d8) fire damage and suffers one of the following effects of the witchkite's choice:

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The witchstalker has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SmellMagic.name: Smell Magic
SmellMagic.description: The witchstalker can sense the presence and location of magic within 120 feet of itself. It also has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that have cast a spell since the end of the witchstalker's last turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The witchstalker makes two Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

Mind-WrackingHowl{@recharge5}.name: Mind-WrackingHowl{@recharge5}
Mind-WrackingHowl{@recharge5}.description: The witchstalker unleashes a terrible howl, and each creature within 30 feet of it that isn't a Monstrosity must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 24 (7d6) psychic damage and has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration on spells until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The assassin bug has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The assassin bug makes two bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned this way, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Ovipositor.name: Ovipositor
Ovipositor.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: The target is infested with 1d3 assassin bug eggs, which immediately hatch into assassin bug maggots. At the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage per maggot infesting it. Applying fire to the bite wound before the end of the target's next turn deals 1 fire damage to the target and kills these assassin bug maggots. After this time, the maggots are too far under the skin to be burned.

RadiantEyes.name: Radiant Eyes
RadiantEyes.description: While its eyes are open, a blindheim projects bright light in a 60-foot cone and dim light for an additional 60 feet. It sets the orientation of this cone at the end of each of its turns. All creatures that can see the blindheim have disadvantage on attack rolls while in the area of bright light and within 15 feet of the blindheim. Creatures with the Sunlight Sensitivity trait that can see the blindheim have disadvantage on attack rolls anywhere in the area of bright light.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

RadiantBlast.name: RadiantBlast
RadiantBlast.description: Radiant energy erupts from the blindheim's eyes in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 7 (2d6) radiant damage and be blinded until the end of the blindheim's next turn. Creatures with the Sunlight Sensitivity trait have disadvantage on this saving throw.

LimitedAmphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
LimitedAmphibiousness.description: The crab folk can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged once every 24 hours to avoid suffocating.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The crab folk makes two claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the crab folk can automatically hit the target with its claw, and the crab folk can't make attacks with that claw against other targets. The crab folk has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

DireCacophony.name: Dire Cacophony
DireCacophony.description: Any creature other than a dire corby that starts its turn within 60 feet of a dire corby and can hear it must make a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is unable to use the Dash action, cannot climb, or cast spells other than cantrips until the start of its next turn.

KeenHearing.name: Keen Hearing
KeenHearing.description: The dire corby has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dire corby makes two claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

TurnImmunity.name: Turn Immunity
TurnImmunity.description: The eye of fear and flame is immune to effects that turn undead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The eye of fear and flame makes two claw attacks and uses its Gemstone Eyes.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

GemstoneEyes.name: GemstoneEyes
GemstoneEyes.description: The eye of fear and flame shoots one of the following magical eye rays, choosing one target it can see within 90 feet of it.

DenizenoftheMist.name: Denizen of the Mist
DenizenoftheMist.description: During its turn, the fog giant ignores the effects of fog cloud spells cast by it or other allied fog giants.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two greatsword attacks and casts fog cloud.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 29 (6d6 + 8) slashing damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

PettyTyrant{@recharge}.name: PettyTyrant{@recharge}
PettyTyrant{@recharge}.description: The fog giant shouts bloodcurdling threats at the creatures that serve it. Each medium or smaller ally of the giant within 120 feet of it that can see or hear it can use its reaction to make a melee attack.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The forlarren has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The forlarren makes two claw attacks and one gore attack, or it makes three chromatic ray attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

ChromaticRay.name: ChromaticRay
ChromaticRay.description: rs 6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) lightning damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The jermlaine has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

VerminFriend.name: Vermin Friend
VerminFriend.description: The jermlaine can speak to and understand rats and giant rats.

SwarmingRush.name: Swarming Rush
SwarmingRush.description: A jermlaine adds 1d4 to its weapon damage rolls while within 5 feet of another, conscious jermlaine.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw -1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 (1d4 - 3) bludgeoning damage.

Dart.name: Dart
Dart.description: rw 3 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

IronScent.name: Iron Scent
IronScent.description: The khargra can scent the location of ferrous metal within 30 feet of it.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage, and if the target is wearing metal armor or carrying a metal shield, the khargra attaches to that armor or shield. While attached, the khargra doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the khargra's turns, roll a d20. On a 10 or higher, the armor or shield takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.

EarthPhasing.name: EarthPhasing
EarthPhasing.description: Until the end of its next turn, the khargra can fly through nonmagical earth and stone. While doing so, it doesn't disturb the material it moves through. It can end its movement within earth or stone, but if it remains within earth or stone when this ability ends, it takes 14 (4d6) force damage and immediately moves to the nearest unoccupied space.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw -1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 bludgeoning damage.

BlessingofBountifulGenerosity(1/Day).name: BlessingofBountifulGenerosity(1/Day)
BlessingofBountifulGenerosity(1/Day).description: The killmoulis targets up to eight creatures within 100 feet of it that it can see. The next time a target finishes a long rest, it regains all spent Hit Dice and gains 10 temporary hit points.

CurseofPoorHospitality(1/Day).name: CurseofPoorHospitality(1/Day)
CurseofPoorHospitality(1/Day).description: The killmoulis targets up to eight creatures within 100 feet of it that it can see. The next time a target completes a long rest, it does not regain spent Hit Dice.

VexingPresence.name: Vexing Presence
VexingPresence.description: While within 30 feet of a mite that can see it, a non-fey creature has disadvantage on Dexterity checks and Dexterity saving throws.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

BloodBoilingHex{@recharge}.name: BloodBoilingHex{@recharge}
BloodBoilingHex{@recharge}.description: The mite places a hex on a creature it can see within 60 feet of it for 1 minute. If the mite is hidden, using this ability does not reveal its location. While the creature is affected by this hex, whenever it makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, it must roll a d6 and subtract the number rolled from the d20 roll. On any turn in which it suffers the effect of the hex, the target can attack an ally as a reaction, ignoring the effect of the hex when it does so. It can then ignore the effect of the hex until the end of its turn.

NeedleDefense.name: Needle Defense
NeedleDefense.description: Each time a creature makes a melee attack against a needle lord, it takes 2 piercing damage. A creature can choose to make an attack with disadvantage to avoid this damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The nettle lord makes 2 raking vine attacks.

NeedleVolley.name: NeedleVolley
NeedleVolley.description: The needle lord makes up to 1d6 needle attacks, but it cannot attack the same target more than twice during its turn.

RakingVine.name: RakingVine
RakingVine.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 11 piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. The needle lord has two raking vines, each of which can grapple only one target.

Needle.name: Needle
Needle.description: rw 2 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

CloseQuartersShooting.name: Close Quarters Shooting
CloseQuartersShooting.description: The needle spawn does not suffer disadvantage on ranged attacks while within 5 feet of a hostile creature that can see it and isn't incapacitated, if the target of the attack is also within 5 feet of the needle spawn.

NeedleVolley.name: NeedleVolley
NeedleVolley.description: The needle spawn makes up to 1d6 needle attacks, but it cannot attack the same target more than twice during its turn.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Needle.name: Needle
Needle.description: rw 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The norker makes one mace and one bite attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The norker war leader makes one greataxe and one bite attack, and also uses Fight On, You Slugs.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

FightOn,YouSlugs.name: FightOn,YouSlugs
FightOn,YouSlugs.description: The norker war leader picks up to three allied goblinoids within 60 feet that can see it. The chosen creatures can each use their reactions to make a single melee attack.

AgileFlier.name: Agile Flier
AgileFlier.description: Opportunity attacks against the screaming devilkin have disadvantage while it is flying.

CeaselessScreaming.name: Ceaseless Screaming
CeaselessScreaming.description: Any creature other than a screaming devilkin that starts its turn within 30 feet of one or more screaming devilkins and can hear it must make a DC 10

StuntedLegs.name: Stunted Legs
StuntedLegs.description: The screaming devilkin has disadvantage on attack rolls and all attack rolls made against it gain advantage while the devilkin isn't flying.

BarbedTail.name: BarbedTail
BarbedTail.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

EtherealJaunt.name: Ethereal Jaunt
EtherealJaunt.description: As a bonus action, a xill can magically shift from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

PoisonStinger.name: Poison Stinger
PoisonStinger.description: The xill injects poison into one creature it hit with its claws this turn. The chosen creature must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, with disadvantage if the xill hit it more than once this turn, taking 14 (4d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned this way.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The xill makes four claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

EntropicAura.name: Entropic Aura
EntropicAura.description: Each creature that is not a construct or undead that ends its turn within 15 feet of Ygorl takes 14 (4d6) necrotic damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Ygorl fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Ygorl has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ygorl makes three attacks: two with its scythe, and one with its Entropic Touch.

Scythe.name: Scythe
Scythe.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) slashing damage plus 19 (3d12) necrotic damage. Any creature reduced to 0 hit points by this attack dies, with its body and everything it is wearing and carrying, except magic items, exploding into a cloud of ash. The creature can be restored to life only by means of a wish spell.

EntropicTouch.name: EntropicTouch
EntropicTouch.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of exhaustion.

SummonSlaadi(1/Day).name: SummonSlaadi(1/Day)
SummonSlaadi(1/Day).description: Ygorl summons 1d4 + 1 death slaad||death slaadi. A summoned slaad appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Ygorl, acts as an ally of Ygorl, and can't summon other slaadi. It remains for 1 minute, until it or Ygorl dies, or until Ygorl dismisses it as an action.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: Ygorl teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

DuergarResilience.name: Duergar Resilience
DuergarResilience.description: The Dankwood duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the Dankwood duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

VerbalJab.name: VerbalJab
VerbalJab.description: The duergar unleashes a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at a creature they can see within 60 feet. If the creature can hear them (it doesn't need to understand them), it must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or take 1d4 psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

Haymaker.name: Haymaker
Haymaker.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the duergar is enlarged, increase their damage to 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The grung can breathe air and water.

PoisonousSkin.name: Poisonous Skin
PoisonousSkin.description: Any creature that grapples the grung or otherwise comes into direct contact with the grung's skin must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A poisoned creature no longer in direct contact with the grung can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The grung's long jump is up to 25 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

GrumpyGrungGrowl.name: GrumpyGrungGrowl
GrumpyGrungGrowl.description: A ferocious gurgling issues from the throat of the Dankwood grung, warning those within 15 feet that they are indeed grumpy. Creatures in that area must succeed at a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 0 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage in melee, or 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage at range. Target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) poison damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The grung can breathe air and water.

PoisonousSkin.name: Poisonous Skin
PoisonousSkin.description: Any creature that grapples the grung or otherwise comes into direct contact with the grung's skin must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A poisoned creature no longer in direct contact with the grung can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The grung's long jump is up to 25 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

GrumpyGrungGrowl.name: GrumpyGrungGrowl
GrumpyGrungGrowl.description: A ferocious gurgling issues from the throat of the Dankwood grung, warning those within 15 feet that they are indeed grumpy. Creatures in that area must succeed at a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 0 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage in melee, or 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage at range. Target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) poison damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage. Target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) poison damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Coral has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Coral makes two Hoof attacks and uses Tail Thump.

Hoof.name: Hoof
Hoof.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

TailThump.name: TailThump
TailThump.description: Coral slams her tail down, unleashing a burst of magical force toward one creature she can see within 60 feet of her. The target must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 (4d10) force damage and has the prone condition. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target dies, and its body is reduced to fine dust.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The dandylion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The dandylion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dandylion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dandylion makes one Bite attack and one Claws attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) slashing damage. If the dandylion moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. If the target has the prone condition, the dandylion can make one Bite attack against it as a bonus action.

RejuvenatingSeedpods(2/Day).name: RejuvenatingSeedpods(2/Day)
RejuvenatingSeedpods(2/Day).description: The dandylion releases a burst of seedpods from its tail, filling a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature of the dandylion's choice in the sphere can immediately end one of the following conditions on itself (creature's choice): blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned. In addition, all soil in the sphere's area is enriched, restoring withered vegetation in the area to full health and causing all crops in the area to produce twice the normal harvest for the next year.

FieryWings.name: Fiery Wings
FieryWings.description: Rain's wings are made of flame, and they shed bright light out to 15 feet and dim light for an additional 15 feet. At the start of each of Rain's turns, each creature of Rain's choice within 5 feet of her takes 3 (1d6) fire damage. A creature that hits Rain with a melee attack takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Rain has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Rain makes two Hoof attacks.

Hoof.name: Hoof
Hoof.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage.

HaloedHornBurst{@recharge5}.name: HaloedHornBurst{@recharge5}
HaloedHornBurst{@recharge5}.description: Rain uses her haloed horn to produce one of the following magical effects:

Glitterstorm.name: Glitterstorm
Glitterstorm.description: Rain emits a rainbow beam in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) radiant damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one; creatures of evil alignment have disadvantage on this saving throw. If the damage from this effect reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the creature dies, and its body turns into glittery flowers.

HealingRainbows.name: HealingRainbows
HealingRainbows.description: Rain releases a wave of rejuvenating multicolored light in a 30-foot cone. Each creature of Rain's choice in that area regains 18 (4d8) hit points.

ElectrifiedChassis.name: Electrified Chassis
ElectrifiedChassis.description: A creature that hits the scrapper with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 19 (3d12) lightning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The scrapper makes two Spike Punch attacks. It can replace one of those with a Wires attack.

SpikePunch.name: SpikePunch
SpikePunch.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

Wires.name: Wires
Wires.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one Large or smaller creature. on hit: The target has the grappled condition (escape DC 16) and must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the scrapper and take 19 (3d12) lightning damage. The scrapper can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

EyeBeam{@recharge5}.name: EyeBeam{@recharge5}
EyeBeam{@recharge5}.description: The scrapper shoots a magical beam from its extended eye at one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Seth can breathe air and water.

InvisibleinWater.name: Invisible in Water
InvisibleinWater.description: Seth has the invisible condition while fully immersed in water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Seth makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d6 + 7) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

RiptideBreath{@recharge5}.name: RiptideBreath{@recharge5}
RiptideBreath{@recharge5}.description: Seth exhales a torrent of frigid water in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8) cold damage and has the incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

SpaceDweller.name: Space Dweller
SpaceDweller.description: Sheldon can breathe normally in a vacuum.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Sheldon makes either two Bite attacks, two Blueberry Fling attacks, or one of each.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.

BlueberryFling.name: BlueberryFling
BlueberryFling.description: rw 7 to hit, range 30 ft., one creature. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) blueberry damage.

JetstreamBreath{@recharge5}.name: JetstreamBreath{@recharge5}
JetstreamBreath{@recharge5}.description: Sheldon exhales a line of magical wind that is 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 21 (6d6) force damage, is pushed 15 feet away from Sheldon, and has the prone condition. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

DiveAttack.name: Dive Attack
DiveAttack.description: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage to the target.

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

SummonAirElemental.name: SummonAirElemental
SummonAirElemental.description: Five aarakocra within 30 feet of each other can magically summon an air elemental. Each of the five must use its action and movement on three consecutive turns to perform an aerial dance and must maintain concentration while doing so (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). When all five have finished their third turn of the dance, the elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of them. It is friendly toward them and obeys their spoken commands. It remains for 1 hour, until it or all its summoners die, or until any of its summoners dismisses it as a bonus action. A summoner can't perform the dance again until it finishes a short rest. When the elemental returns to the Elemental Plane of Air, any aarakocra within 5 feet of it can return with it.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

EldritchRestoration.name: Eldritch Restoration
EldritchRestoration.description: If destroyed, the aboleth gains a new body in 5d10 days, reviving with all its Hit Points|XPHB in the Far Realm or another location chosen by the DM.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the aboleth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MucusCloud.name: Mucus Cloud
MucusCloud.description: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by mucus. con DC 14, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the aboleth at the end of the aboleth's turn. {@actSaveFail} The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target's skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can't regain Hit Points|XPHB unless it is underwater.

ProbingTelepathy.name: Probing Telepathy
ProbingTelepathy.description: If a creature the aboleth can see communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The aboleth makes two Tentacle attacks and uses either Consume Memories or Dominate Mind if available.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: m 9, reach 15 ft. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 14) from one of four tentacles.

ConsumeMemories.name: ConsumeMemories
ConsumeMemories.description: int DC 16, one creature within 30 feet that is Charmed|XPHB or Grappled|XPHB by the aboleth. {@actSaveFail} 10 (3d6) Psychic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} The aboleth gains the target's memories if the target is a Humanoid and is reduced to 0 Hit Points|XPHB by this action.

DominateMind(2/Day).name: DominateMind(2/Day)
DominateMind(2/Day).description: wis DC 16, one creature the aboleth can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Charmed|XPHB condition until the aboleth dies or is on a different plane of existence from the target. While Charmed|XPHB, the target acts as an ally to the aboleth and is under its control while within 60 feet of it. In addition, the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.

FearofFire.name: Fear of Fire
FearofFire.description: If the yeti takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage|XPHB on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two attacks, using Claw or Ice Throw in any combination.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 11, reach 5 ft. on hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Cold damage.

IceThrow.name: IceThrow
IceThrow.description: r 11, range 60/240 ft. on hit: 12 (2d4 + 7) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Cold damage.

ChillingGaze.name: ChillingGaze
ChillingGaze.description: con DC 18, one creature the yeti can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} 21 (6d6) Cold damage, and the target has the Paralyzed|XPHB condition until the start of the yeti's next turn unless the target has Immunity|XPHB to Cold damage. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to this yeti's Chilling Gaze for 1 hour.

ColdBreath{@recharge}.name: ColdBreath{@recharge}
ColdBreath{@recharge}.description: con DC 18, each creature in a 30-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 45 (10d8) Cold damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Melf's Acid Arrow|XPHB (level 3 version).

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 11, reach 10 ft. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Acid damage.

AcidBreath{@recharge5}.name: AcidBreath{@recharge5}
AcidBreath{@recharge5}.description: dex DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line. {@actSaveFail} 54 (12d8) Acid damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the dracolich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The dracolich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dracolich can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

FrightfulPresence.name: FrightfulPresence
FrightfulPresence.description: Each creature of the dracolich's choice that is within 120 feet of the dracolich and aware of it must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dracolich's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

LightningBreath{@recharge5}.name: LightningBreath{@recharge5}
LightningBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dracolich exhales lightning in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Shatter|XPHB.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 12, reach 10 ft. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) Slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) Lightning damage.

LightningBreath{@recharge5}.name: LightningBreath{@recharge5}
LightningBreath{@recharge5}.description: dex DC 19, each creature in a 90-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line. {@actSaveFail} 60 (11d10) Lightning damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Sleep Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast Scorching Ray|XPHB.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 11, reach 10 ft. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Fire damage.

FireBreath{@recharge5}.name: FireBreath{@recharge5}
FireBreath{@recharge5}.description: dex DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line. {@actSaveFail} 45 (10d8) Fire damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

SleepBreath.name: SleepBreath
SleepBreath.description: con DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it repeats the save. 2 The target has the Unconscious|XPHB condition for 10 minutes. This effect ends for the target if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Repulsion Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast Guiding Bolt|XPHB (level 2 version).

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 12, reach 10 ft. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) Slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) Lightning damage.

LightningBreath{@recharge5}.name: LightningBreath{@recharge5}
LightningBreath{@recharge5}.description: dex DC 19, each creature in a 90-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line. {@actSaveFail} 55 (10d10) Lightning damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

RepulsionBreath.name: RepulsionBreath
RepulsionBreath.description: str DC 19, each creature in a 30-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} The target is pushed up to 60 feet straight away from the dragon and has the Prone|XPHB condition.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Slowing Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast Mind Spike|XPHB (level 4 version).

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 11, reach 10 ft. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Acid damage.

AcidBreath{@recharge5}.name: AcidBreath{@recharge5}
AcidBreath{@recharge5}.description: dex DC 18, each creature in an 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line. {@actSaveFail} 54 (12d8) Acid damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

SlowingBreath.name: SlowingBreath
SlowingBreath.description: con DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} The target can't take Reactions; its Speed|XPHB is halved; and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action|XPHB on its turn, not both. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Spellcasting to cast Guiding Bolt|XPHB (level 2 version) or (B) Weakening Breath.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 14, reach 10 ft. on hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Fire damage.

FireBreath{@recharge5}.name: FireBreath{@recharge5}
FireBreath{@recharge5}.description: dex DC 21, each creature in a 60-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 66 (12d10) Fire damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

WeakeningBreath.name: WeakeningBreath
WeakeningBreath.description: str DC 21, each creature that isn't currently affected by this breath in a 60-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} The target has Disadvantage|XPHB on Strength-based D20 Test|XPHB|D20 Tests and subtracts 3 (1d6) from its damage rolls. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Mind Spike|XPHB (level 3 version).

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 11, reach 10 ft. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

PoisonBreath{@recharge5}.name: PoisonBreath{@recharge5}
PoisonBreath{@recharge5}.description: con DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 56 (16d6) Poison damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Scorching Ray|XPHB.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 14, reach 10 ft. on hit: 13 (1d10 + 8) Slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) Fire damage.

FireBreath{@recharge5}.name: FireBreath{@recharge5}
FireBreath{@recharge5}.description: dex DC 21, each creature in a 60-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 59 (17d6) Fire damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of (A) Paralyzing Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast Ice Knife|XPHB.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 13, reach 10 ft. on hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Cold damage.

ColdBreath{@recharge5}.name: ColdBreath{@recharge5}
ColdBreath{@recharge5}.description: con DC 20, each creature in a 60-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 54 (12d8) Cold damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

ParalyzingBreath.name: ParalyzingBreath
ParalyzingBreath.description: con DC 20, each creature in a 60-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. 1 The target has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition until the end of its next turn, when it repeats the save. 2 The target has the Paralyzed|XPHB condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

IceWalk.name: Ice Walk
IceWalk.description: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, Difficult Terrain|XPHB composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend

Pistol.description: r 5, range 30/90 ft. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Piercing damage.

IncorporealMovement.description: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain|XPHB. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

CorruptingTouch.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Necrotic damage.

DeathlyWail(1/Day).description: The banshee releases a mournful wail if it isn't in sunlight. con DC 13, each creature within 30 feet that can hear the wail and isn't a Construct or an Undead. {@actSaveFail} If the target has 25 Hit Points|XPHB or fewer, it drops to 0 Hit Points|XPHB. Otherwise, the target takes 10 (3d6) Psychic damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: m 6, reach 10 ft. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

TormentingBite.name: TormentingBite
TormentingBite.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) Psychic damage.

Thrash.name: Thrash
Thrash.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

Bite.name: Bite

Bite.name: Bite

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The devil has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

Beard.name: Beard
Beard.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the start of the devil's next turn. Until this poison ends, the target can't regain Hit Points|XPHB.

InfernalGlaive.name: InfernalGlaive
InfernalGlaive.description: m 5, reach 10 ft. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a creature and doesn't already have an infernal wound, it is subjected to the following effect. con DC 12. {@actSaveFail} The target receives an infernal wound. While wounded, the target loses 5 (1d10) Hit Points|XPHB at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points|XPHB to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine|XPHB) check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 10, reach 10 ft. on hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) Piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) Lightning damage.

Constrict.description: str DC 18, one Large or smaller creature the behir can see within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} 28 (5d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape 16), and it has the Restrained|XPHB condition until the grapple ends.

If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a slaad, it is subjected to the following effect. con DC 15. {@actSaveFail} The target is cursed. The cursed target can't regain Hit Points|XPHB, and its Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) after every 24 hours and doesn't return to normal after finishing a Long Rest|XPHB. If the curse reduces the target's Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point maximum to 0, the curse ends, and instead of dying, the target instantly transforms into a Red Slaad|XMM or, if it can cast spells of level 3 or higher, a Green Slaad|XMM. MagicResistance.description: The dao has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

If the dao knows it, the dao can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the dao can understand. If the dao casts the spell for the creature, the dao suffers none of the spell's stress. Once the dao has cast it three times, the dao can't do so again for 365 days.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

Subsequent Failures: The Poisoned|XPHB target's Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point maximum decreases by 5 (1d10).

WitheringSword.name: WitheringSword
WitheringSword.description: m 8, reach 5 ft. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) Necrotic damage.

EntanglingRope(RequiresMagicRope).name: EntanglingRope(RequiresMagicRope)
EntanglingRope(RequiresMagicRope).description: str DC 16, one creature the erinyes can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 14 (4d6) Force damage, and the target has the Restrained|XPHB condition until the rope is destroyed, the erinyes uses a Bonus Action|XPHB to release the target, or the erinyes uses Entangling Rope again.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The ettercap can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the ettercap knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ettercap makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the start of the ettercap's next turn.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

WebStrand{@recharge5}.name: WebStrand{@recharge5}
WebStrand{@recharge5}.description: dex DC 12, one Large or smaller creature the ettercap can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Restrained|XPHB condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability|XPHB to Fire damage; Immunity|XPHB to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ettin makes one Battleaxe attack and one Morningstar attack.

Battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
Battleaxe.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

Morningstar.name: Morningstar
Morningstar.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Piercing damage, and the target has Disadvantage|XPHB on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

TheColorsofAge.name: The Colors of Age
TheColorsofAge.description: A faerie dragon's scales change hue as it ages, moving through all the colors of the rainbow. All faerie dragons have innate spellcasting ability, gaining new spells as they mature.

SuperiorInvisibility.name: Superior Invisibility
SuperiorInvisibility.description: As a bonus action, the dragon can magically turn invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the dragon wears or carries is invisible with it.

LimitedTelepathy.name: Limited Telepathy
LimitedTelepathy.description: Using telepathy, the dragon can magically communicate with any other faerie dragon within 60 feet of it.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The faerie dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 1 piercing damage.

EuphoriaBreath{@recharge5}.name: EuphoriaBreath{@recharge5}
EuphoriaBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a puff of euphoria gas at one creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw, or for 1 minute, the target can't take reactions and must roll a d6 at the start of each of its turns to determine its behavior during the turn:

EuphoriaBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a puff of euphoria gas at one creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw, or for 1 minute, the target can't take reactions and must roll a d6 at the start of each of its turns to determine its behavior during the turn:

FireAura.name: Fire Aura
FireAura.description: At the end of each of the elemental's turns, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the elemental takes 5 (1d10) Fire damage. Creatures and flammable objects in the Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation start burning|XPHB.

FireForm.name: Fire Form
FireForm.description: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so, and it can enter a creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) Fire damage.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The elemental sheds Bright Light|XPHB in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light|XPHB for an additional 30 feet.

WaterSusceptibility.name: Water Susceptibility
WaterSusceptibility.description: The elemental takes 3 (1d6) Cold damage for every 5 feet the elemental moves in water or for every gallon of water splashed on it.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The elemental makes two Burn attacks.

Burn.name: Burn
Burn.description: m 6, reach 5 ft. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it starts burning|XPHB.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two attacks, using Flame Sword or Hammer Throw in any combination.

FlameSword.name: FlameSword
FlameSword.description: m 11, reach 10 ft. on hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Fire damage.

HammerThrow.name: HammerThrow
HammerThrow.description: r 11, range 60/240 ft. on hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) Bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) Fire damage, and the target is pushed up to 15 feet straight away from the giant and has Disadvantage|XPHB on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

HeatedBody.name: Heated Body
HeatedBody.description: A creature that touches the snake or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The snake makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The flameskull sheds Bright Light|XPHB in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light|XPHB for an additional 15 feet.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The flameskull has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

UndeadRestoration.name: Undead Restoration
UndeadRestoration.description: If the flameskull is destroyed, it regains all its Hit Points|XPHB in 1 hour unless Holy Water is sprinkled on its remains or the Dispel Evil and Good|XPHB spell is cast on them.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The flameskull makes two Fire Ray attacks.

FireRay.name: FireRay
FireRay.description: m,r 5, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Fire damage.

AversiontoFire.name: Aversion to Fire
AversiontoFire.description: If the golem takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage|XPHB on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description: Whenever the golem starts its turn Bloodied|XPHB, roll 1d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object. Once the golem goes berserk, it remains so until it is destroyed or it is no longer Bloodied|XPHB.

LightningAbsorption.name: Lightning Absorption
LightningAbsorption.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to Lightning damage, it regains a number of Hit Points|XPHB equal to the Lightning damage dealt.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The golem has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The golem makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) Lightning damage.

AdvancedTelepathy.name: Advanced Telepathy
AdvancedTelepathy.description: The flumph perceives the content of any telepathic communication within 60 feet of it.

ProneDeficiency.name: Prone Deficiency
ProneDeficiency.description: If the flumph receives the Prone|XPHB condition, roll a die. On an odd number, it has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition. At the end of each of its turns, the flumph makes a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, ending the Incapacitated|XPHB condition on a success.

TelepathicShroud.name: Telepathic Shroud
TelepathicShroud.description: The flumph's thoughts can't be read by any means, and magic can't detect its location or observe it remotely.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: m 4, reach 5 feet. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Acid damage.

StenchSpray(1/Day).name: StenchSpray(1/Day)
StenchSpray(1/Day).description: dex DC 10, one creature the flumph can see within 15 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target is coated in a foul-smelling liquid, exudes a stench for 1d4 hours, and has the Poisoned|XPHB condition while the stench lasts. Other creatures have the Poisoned|XPHB condition while in a 5-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the coated target. The target can remove the stench on itself if it bathes during a Short Rest|XPHB|Short or Long Rest|XPHB.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The snake doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 1 Piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage.

AntimagicSusceptibility.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
AntimagicSusceptibility.description: The sword is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the sword must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the sword remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fomorian makes two Stone Club attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Warping Hex if available.

StoneClub.name: StoneClub
StoneClub.description: m 9, reach 15 ft. on hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

WarpingHex{@recharge4}.name: WarpingHex{@recharge4}
WarpingHex{@recharge4}.description: wis DC 16, one creature the fomorian can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 21 (6d6) Psychic damage, and the target gains 1 Exhaustion|XPHB level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The frog can breathe air and water.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The frog's Long Jump|XPHB is up to 10 feet and its High Jump|XPHB is up to 5 feet with or without a running start.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 3, reach 5 ft. on hit: 1 Piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two attacks, using Frost Axe or Great Bow in any combination.

FrostAxe.name: FrostAxe
FrostAxe.description: m 9, reach 10 ft. on hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Cold damage.

GreatBow.name: GreatBow
GreatBow.description: r 9, range 150/600 ft. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Cold damage, and the target's Speed|XPHB decreases by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

AvalancheSlam.name: AvalancheSlam
AvalancheSlam.description: m 8, reach 5 ft. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the galeb duhr moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) Bludgeoning damage and has the Prone|XPHB condition.

AnimateBoulders(1/Day).name: AnimateBoulders(1/Day)
AnimateBoulders(1/Day).description: The galeb duhr magically animates one or two boulders it can see within 60 feet of itself. Each boulder uses the Galeb Duhr stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1 and lacks this action. The boulder takes its turn immediately after the galeb duhr on the same Initiative|XPHB count, and it obeys the galeb duhr. A boulder remains animate for 1 minute or until it or the galeb duhr dies.

value.condition: (30 ft. when rolling, 60 ft. rolling downhill)

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The gargoyle doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gargoyle makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: The gas spore explodes when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage and become infected with a disease on a failed save. Creatures immune to the poisoned condition are immune to this disease.

EerieResemblance.name: Eerie Resemblance
EerieResemblance.description: The gas spore resembles a beholder. A creature that can see the gas spore can discern its true nature with a successful DC 15 Intelligence (Nature) check.

Touch.name: Touch
Touch.description: mw 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 1 poison damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or become infected with the disease described in the Death Burst trait.

OozeCube.name: Ooze Cube
OozeCube.description: The cube fills its entire space and is transparent. Other creatures can enter that space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the cube's Engulf and has Disadvantage|XPHB on the saving throw.

Transparent.name: Transparent
Transparent.description: Even when the cube is in plain sight, a creature must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom (Perception|XPHB) check to notice the cube if the creature hasn't witnessed the cube move or otherwise act.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) Acid damage.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description: The cube moves up to its Speed|XPHB without provoking Opportunity Attack|XPHB|Opportunity Attacks. The cube can move through the spaces of Large or smaller creatures if it has room inside itself to contain them (see the Ooze Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube trait). dex DC 12, each creature whose space the cube enters for the first time during this move. {@actSaveFail} 10 (3d6) Acid damage, and the target is engulfed. An engulfed target is suffocating, can't cast spells with a Verbal component, has the Restrained|XPHB condition, and takes 10 (3d6) Acid damage at the start of each of the cube's turns. When the cube moves, the engulfed target moves with it. An engulfed target can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 12 Strength (Athletics|XPHB) check. On a successful check, the target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage, and the target moves to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the cube. If there is no unoccupied space, the target fails the save instead.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description: con DC 10, any creature that starts its turn in a 5-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the ghast. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the start of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to this ghast's Stench for 24 hours.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) Necrotic damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a non-Undead creature, it is subjected to the following effect. con DC 10. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Paralyzed|XPHB condition until the end of its next turn.

EtherealSight.name: Ethereal Sight
EtherealSight.description: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain|XPHB. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ghost makes two Withering Touch attacks.

WitheringTouch.name: WitheringTouch
WitheringTouch.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) Necrotic damage.

HorrificVisage.name: HorrificVisage
HorrificVisage.description: wis DC 13, each creature in a 60-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone that can see the ghost and isn't an Undead. {@actSaveFail} 10 (2d6 + 3) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened|XPHB condition until the start of the ghost's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to this ghost's Horrific Visage for 24 hours.

Possession{@recharge}.name: Possession{@recharge}
Possession{@recharge}.description: cha DC 13, one Humanoid the ghost can see within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target is possessed by the ghost; the ghost disappears, and the target has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body, but the target retains awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that specifically target Undead. The ghost's game statistics are the same, except it uses the possessed target's Speed|XPHB, as well as the target's Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution modifiers.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ghoul makes two Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Necrotic damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage. If the target is a creature that isn't an Undead or elf, it is subjected to the following effect. con DC 10. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Paralyzed|XPHB condition until the end of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ape makes two Fist attacks.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: m 9, reach 10 ft. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

BoulderToss{@recharge}.name: BoulderToss{@recharge}
BoulderToss{@recharge}.description: The ape hurls a boulder at a point it can see within 90 feet. dex DC 17, each creature in a 5-foot-radius Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere centered on that point. {@actSaveFail} 24 (7d6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 3, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) Piercing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

BloodiedFury.name: Bloodied Fury
BloodiedFury.description: The boar has Advantage|XPHB on melee attack rolls while it is Bloodied|XPHB.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the boar moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) Piercing damage and has the Prone|XPHB condition.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the start of the centipede's next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The snake makes one Bite attack and uses Constrict.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 6, reach 10 ft. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: str DC 14, one Large or smaller creature the snake can see within 10 feet. {@actSaveFail} 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 14).

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The crab can breathe air and water.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 3, reach 5 ft. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 11) from one of two claws.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The crocodile can hold its breath for 1 hour.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The crocodile makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

Bite.name: Bite
