Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

FireBreath{@recharge5}.name: FireBreath{@recharge5}
FireBreath{@recharge5}.description: The veteran exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 3, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) Slashing damage.

LuringSong.name: LuringSong
LuringSong.description: The harpy sings a magical melody, which lasts until the harpy's Concentration|XPHB ends on it. wis DC 11, each Humanoid and Giant in a 300-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the harpy when the song starts. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Charmed|XPHB condition until the song ends and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. While Charmed|XPHB, the target has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition and ignores the Luring Song of other harpies. If the target is more than 5 feet from the harpy, the target moves on its turn toward the harpy by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet of the harpy. It doesn't avoid Opportunity Attack|XPHB|Opportunity Attacks; however, before moving into damaging terrain (such as lava or a pit) and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, the target repeats the save. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to this harpy's Luring Song for 24 hours.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 1 Slashing damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The hound has Advantage|XPHB on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hound makes two Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

FireBreath{@recharge5}.name: FireBreath{@recharge5}
FireBreath{@recharge5}.description: dex DC 12, each creature in a 15-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 17 (5d6) Fire damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The helmed horror has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpellImmunity.name: Spell Immunity
SpellImmunity.description: The helmed horror is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical choices include Heat Metal|XPHB, Lightning Bolt|XPHB, and Magic Missile|XPHB.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The helmed horror makes two Arcane Sword attacks.

ArcaneSword.name: ArcaneSword
ArcaneSword.description: m 6, reach 5 ft. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) Force damage.

DemonicRestoration.name: Demonic Restoration
DemonicRestoration.description: If the hezrou dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points|XPHB somewhere in the Abyss.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The hezrou has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description: con DC 16, any creature that starts its turn in a 10-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the hezrou. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the start of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

TreeClub.name: TreeClub
TreeClub.description: m 8, reach 10 ft. on hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

TrashLob.name: TrashLob
TrashLob.description: r 8, range 60/240 ft. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the end of its next turn.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The hippogriff doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hippogriff makes two Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage.

MartialAdvantage.name: Martial Advantage
MartialAdvantage.description: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

AuraofAuthority.name: Aura of Authority
AuraofAuthority.description: While in a 10-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the hobgoblin, the hobgoblin and its allies have Advantage|XPHB on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the hobgoblin doesn't have the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hobgoblin makes two attacks, using Greatsword or Longbow in any combination.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: r 4, range 150/600 ft. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage.

AuraofAuthority.name: Aura of Authority
AuraofAuthority.description: While in a 30-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the hobgoblin, the hobgoblin and its allies have Advantage|XPHB on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the hobgoblin doesn't have the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hobgoblin makes three attacks, using Javelin or Longsword in any combination.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: m,r 6, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage, and the target's Speed|XPHB decreases by 10 feet until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: m 6, reach 5 ft. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Slashing damage.

TelepathicBond.name: Telepathic Bond
TelepathicBond.description: While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as its master, the two of them can communicate telepathically with each other.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 1 Piercing damage, and the target is subjected to the following effect. con DC 12. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the end of the homunculus's next turn. 5 The target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition for 1 minute. While Poisoned|XPHB, the target has the Unconscious|XPHB condition, which ends early if the target takes any damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hook horror makes two Hook attacks.

Hook.name: Hook
Hook.description: m 6, reach 10 ft. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the hook horror moves the target 5 feet straight toward or away from itself.

DiabolicalRestoration.name: Diabolical Restoration
DiabolicalRestoration.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points|XPHB somewhere in the Nine Hells.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The devil has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The devil makes three attacks, using Searing Fork or Hurl Flame in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Infernal Tail.

SearingFork.name: SearingFork
SearingFork.description: m 10, reach 10 ft. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) Piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) Fire damage.

HurlFlame.name: HurlFlame
HurlFlame.description: r 8, range 150 ft. on hit: 26 (5d8 + 4) Fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it starts burning|XPHB.

InfernalTail.name: InfernalTail
InfernalTail.description: dex DC 17, one creature the devil can see within 10 feet. {@actSaveFail} 10 (1d8 + 6) Necrotic damage, and the target receives an infernal wound if it doesn't have one. While wounded, the target loses 10 (3d6) Hit Points|XPHB at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points|XPHB to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a DC 17 Wisdom (Medicine|XPHB) check.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The shark can breathe only underwater.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 6 (with Advantage|XPHB if the target doesn't have all its Hit Points|XPHB), reach 5 ft. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

MultipleHeads.name: Multiple Heads
MultipleHeads.description: The hydra has five heads. Whenever the hydra takes 25 damage or more on a single turn, one of its heads dies. The hydra dies if all its heads are dead. At the end of each of its turns when it has at least one living head, the hydra grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken Fire damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 20 Hit Points|XPHB when it grows new heads.

ReactiveHeads.name: Reactive Heads
ReactiveHeads.description: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra Reaction|XPHB that can be used only for Opportunity Attack|XPHB|Opportunity Attacks.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hydra makes as many Bite attacks as it has heads.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 8, reach 10 ft. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) Piercing damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The hyena has Advantage|XPHB on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 2, reach 5 ft. on hit: 3 (1d6) Piercing damage.

DiabolicalRestoration.name: Diabolical Restoration
DiabolicalRestoration.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points|XPHB somewhere in the Nine Hells.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The devil has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The devil makes three Ice Spear attacks. It can replace one attack with a Tail attack.

IceSpear.name: IceSpear
IceSpear.description: m,r 10, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Cold damage. Until the end of its next turn, the target can't take a Bonus Action|XPHB or Reaction|XPHB, its Speed|XPHB decreases by 10 feet, and it can move or take one action on its turn, not both. {@hom}The spear magically returns to the devil's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: m 10, reach 10 ft. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) Cold damage.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: The mephit explodes when it dies. con DC 10, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the mephit. {@actSaveFail} 5 (2d4) Cold damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 3, reach 5 ft. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) Slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Cold damage.

FrostBreath{@recharge}.name: FrostBreath{@recharge}
FrostBreath{@recharge}.description: con DC 10, each creature in a 15-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 7 (3d4) Cold damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The imp has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The imp shape-shifts to resemble a rat (Speed|XPHB 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., Fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., Climb 20 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed|XPHB. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

SuccubusForm.name: Succubus Form
SuccubusForm.description: When the incubus finishes a Long Rest|XPHB, it can shape-shift into a Succubus|XMM, using that stat block instead of this one. Any equipment it's wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The incubus makes two Restless Touch attacks.

RestlessTouch.name: RestlessTouch
RestlessTouch.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) Psychic damage, and the target is cursed for 24 hours or until the incubus dies. Until the curse ends, the target gains no benefit from finishing Short Rests.

DetectIntelligence.name: Detect Intelligence
DetectIntelligence.description: The intellect devourer magically senses the location of any creature within 300 feet of itself that has an Intelligence score of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The intellect devourer makes one Claw attack and uses Devour Intellect.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

DevourIntellect.name: DevourIntellect
DevourIntellect.description: int DC 12, one creature the intellect devourer can see within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} 11 (2d10) Psychic damage, and the target has the Stunned|XPHB condition until the end of the intellect devourer's next turn.

StealBody.name: StealBody
StealBody.description: int DC 12, one Small or Medium creature within 5 feet that has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition, is a Humanoid or Beast, and has 10 Hit Points|XPHB or fewer. {@actSaveFail} The intellect devourer possesses the target, consumes its brain, and teleports inside its skull. While there, the intellect devourer has Cover|XPHB|Total Cover against attacks and other effects originating outside its host. The intellect devourer retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; its understanding of Deep Speech; its telepathy; and its Detect Intelligence trait. It otherwise adopts the target's game statistics. It knows everything the target knew, including spells and languages.

AirForm.name: Air Form
AirForm.description: The stalker can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The stalker has the Invisible|XPHB condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The stalker makes three Wind Swipe attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Vortex.

WindSwipe.name: WindSwipe
WindSwipe.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Force damage.

Vortex.name: Vortex
Vortex.description: con DC 14, one Large or smaller creature in the stalker's space. {@actSaveFail} 7 (1d8 + 3) Thunder damage, and the target has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape 13). Until the grapple ends, the target can't cast spells with a Verbal component and takes 7 (2d6) Thunder damage at the start of each of the stalker's turns.

FireAbsorption.name: Fire Absorption
FireAbsorption.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to Fire damage, it regains a number of Hit Points|XPHB equal to the Fire damage dealt.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The golem has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

BladedArm.name: BladedArm
BladedArm.description: m 12, reach 10 ft. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Fire damage.

FieryBolt.name: FieryBolt
FieryBolt.description: r 10, range 120 ft. on hit: 36 (8d8) Fire damage.

PoisonBreath{@recharge}.name: PoisonBreath{@recharge}
PoisonBreath{@recharge}.description: con DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 55 (10d10) Poison damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 1, reach 5 ft. on hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) Piercing damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The jackalwere has Advantage|XPHB on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the jackalwere's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The jackalwere makes two Rend or Slam attacks.

Rend(JackalorHybridFormOnly).name: Rend(JackalorHybridFormOnly)
Rend(JackalorHybridFormOnly).description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

Slam(HumanorHybridFormOnly).name: Slam(HumanorHybridFormOnly)
Slam(HumanorHybridFormOnly).description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

SleepGaze{@recharge5}.name: SleepGaze{@recharge5}
SleepGaze{@recharge5}.description: wis DC 10, one creature the jackalwere can see within 30 feet (Constructs and Undead succeed automatically). {@actSaveFail} The target has the Unconscious|XPHB condition for 10 minutes or until it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to this jackalwere's Sleep Gaze for 24 hours.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight|XPHB) check.

ShadowBlade.name: ShadowBlade
ShadowBlade.description: m,r 5, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Necrotic damage. {@hom}The blade magically returns to the kenku's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The whale can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 6, reach 5 ft. on hit: 21 (5d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Radiant damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: r 2, range 100/400 ft. on hit: 11 (2d10) Piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) Radiant damage.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Sling.name: Sling
Sling.description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The kraken can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day,or5/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(4/Day,or5/DayinLair).description: If the kraken fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kraken makes two Tentacle attacks and uses Fling, Lightning Strike, or Swallow.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: m 17, reach 30 ft. on hit: 24 (4d6 + 10) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 20) from one of ten tentacles, and it has the Restrained|XPHB condition until the grapple ends.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description: The kraken throws a Large or smaller creature Grappled|XPHB by it to a space it can see within 60 feet of itself that isn't in the air. dex DC 25, the creature thrown and each creature in the destination space. {@actSaveFail} 18 (4d8) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Prone|XPHB condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

LightningStrike.name: LightningStrike
LightningStrike.description: dex DC 23, one creature the kraken can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 33 (6d10) Lightning damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description: dex DC 25, one creature Grappled|XPHB by the kraken (it can have up to four creatures swallowed at a time). {@actSaveFail} 23 (3d8 + 10) Piercing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is swallowed and no longer Grappled|XPHB. A swallowed creature has the Restrained|XPHB condition, has Cover|XPHB|Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and takes 24 (7d6) Acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has Disadvantage|XPHB on ability checks and attack rolls.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: m,r 3, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

StickyNet(1/Day).name: StickyNet(1/Day)
StickyNet(1/Day).description: dex DC 10, one Large or smaller creature the kuo-toa can see within 15 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Restrained|XPHB condition until the net is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Immunity|XPHB to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage). A creature can take an action to make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics|XPHB) check to free itself or another creature in a net within 5 feet, destroying the net on a success.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has Disadvantage|XPHB on ability checks and attack rolls.

Multiattack.description: The kuo-toa makes three Strange Scepter attacks.

StrangeScepter.name: StrangeScepter
StrangeScepter.description: m,r 6, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. on hit: 20 (5d6 + 3) Lightning damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has Disadvantage|XPHB on ability checks and attack rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kuo-toa makes two Bone Whip attacks.

BoneWhip.name: BoneWhip
BoneWhip.description: m 5, reach 10 ft. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Lightning damage, and the target can't make Opportunity Attack|XPHB|Opportunity Attacks until the start of the kuo-toa's next turn.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has Disadvantage|XPHB on ability checks and attack rolls.

PincerStaff.name: PincerStaff
PincerStaff.description: m 4, reach 10 ft. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 12). Until the grapple ends, the kuo-toa can't make Pincer Staff attacks.

ConjureSlimyGlob.name: ConjureSlimyGlob
ConjureSlimyGlob.description: r 4, range 60 ft. on hit: 9 (3d4 + 2) Acid damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The lamia makes two Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Corrupting Touch.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Psychic damage.

CorruptingTouch.name: CorruptingTouch
CorruptingTouch.description: wis DC 13, one creature the lamia can see within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} 13 (3d8) Psychic damage, and the target is cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has the Charmed|XPHB and Poisoned|XPHB conditions.

HellishRestoration.name: Hellish Restoration
HellishRestoration.description: If the lemure dies in the Nine Hells, it revives with all its Hit Points|XPHB in 1d10 days unless it is killed by a creature under the effects of a Bless|XPHB spell or its remains are sprinkled with Holy Water.

VileSlime.name: VileSlime
VileSlime.description: m 2, reach 5 ft. on hit: 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day,or5/DayinLair).name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
LegendaryResistance(4/Day,or5/DayinLair).description: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SpiritJar.name: Spirit Jar
SpiritJar.description: If destroyed, the lich reforms in 1d10 days if it has a spirit jar, reviving with all its Hit Points|XPHB. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the lich's lair.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The lich makes three attacks, using Eldritch Burst or Paralyzing Touch in any combination.

EldritchBurst.name: EldritchBurst
EldritchBurst.description: m,r 12, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. on hit: 31 (4d12 + 5) Force damage.

ParalyzingTouch.name: ParalyzingTouch

After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. If the Frightened|XPHB target is cursed by the revenant (see Vow of Revenge), the target also has the Paralyzed|XPHB condition for the duration.

Gore.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Piercing damage. If target is a Large or smaller creature and the rhinoceros moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) Piercing damage and has the Prone|XPHB condition.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The roc makes two Beak attacks. It can replace one attack with a Talons attack.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: m 13, reach 10 ft. on hit: 28 (3d12 + 9) Piercing damage.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: m 13, reach 5 ft. on hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) Slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 19) from both talons, and it has the Restrained|XPHB condition until the grapple ends.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The roper can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) Piercing damage.

AntimagicSusceptibility.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
AntimagicSusceptibility.description: The rug is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the rug must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

DamageTransfer.description: While it is grappling a creature, the rug takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the creature grappled by the rug takes the other half.

FalseAppearance.description: While the rug remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal rug.

Smother.name: Smother
Smother.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. on hit: The creature is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, blinded, and at risk of suffocating, and the rug can't smother another target. In addition, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

IronScent.name: Iron Scent
IronScent.description: The rust monster can pinpoint the location of ferrous metal within 30 feet of itself.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The rust monster makes one Bite attack and uses Antennae twice.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 3, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

Antennae.name: Antennae
Antennae.description: The rust monster targets one nonmagical metal objectarmor or a weaponworn or carried by a creature within 5 feet of itself. dex DC 11, the creature with the object. {@actSaveFail} The object takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers (armor) or to its attack rolls (weapon). Armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10, and a weapon is destroyed if its penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the Mending|XPHB spell on the armor or weapon.

DestroyMetal.description: The rust monster touches a nonmagical metal object within 5 feet of itself that isn't being worn or carried. The touch destroys a 1-foot Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube of the object.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 6, reach 5 ft. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

LimitedAmphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
LimitedAmphibiousness.description: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

SharkTelepathy.description: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

Bite.name: Bite

Mockery.description: wis DC 12, one creature the satyr can see within 90 feet. {@actSaveFail} 5 (1d6 + 2) Psychic damage.

FearsomeClaw.name: FearsomeClaw
FearsomeClaw.description: m 3, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) Slashing damage, and the target has the Frightened|XPHB condition until the end of the scarecrow's next turn.

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description: m 2, reach 5 ft. on hit: 1 Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

Shortsword.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

Longbow.description: r 4, range 150/600 ft. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The hag can breathe air and water.

VileAppearance.name: Vile Appearance
VileAppearance.description: wis DC 11, any Beast or Humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hag and can see the hag's true form. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Frightened|XPHB condition until the start of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to this hag's Vile Appearance for 24 hours.

Claw.name: Claw

DeathGlare{@recharge5}.description: wis DC 11, one Frightened|XPHB creature the hag can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} If the target has 20 Hit Points|XPHB or fewer, it drops to 0 Hit Points|XPHB. Otherwise, the target takes 13 (3d8) Psychic damage.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

Amorphous.description: The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

SunlightWeakness.name: Sunlight Weakness
SunlightWeakness.description: While in sunlight, the shadow has Disadvantage|XPHB on D20 Test|XPHB|D20 Tests.

DrainingSwipe.name: DrainingSwipe
DrainingSwipe.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score decreases by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. If a Humanoid is slain by this attack, a Shadow rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

DemonicRestoration.description: If the demon dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points|XPHB somewhere in the Abyss.

LightSensitivity.description: While in Bright Light|XPHB, the demon has Disadvantage|XPHB on ability checks and attack rolls.

UmbralClaw.name: UmbralClaw
UmbralClaw.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) Psychic damage.

LightningAbsorption.name: Lightning Absorption
LightningAbsorption.description: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to Lightning damage, it regains a number of Hit Points|XPHB equal to the Lightning damage dealt.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shambling mound makes three Charged Tendril attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Engulf.

ChargedTendril.name: ChargedTendril
ChargedTendril.description: m 7, reach 10 ft. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) Lightning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the shambling mound pulls the target 5 feet straight toward itself.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description: str DC 15, one Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target is pulled into the shambling mound's space and has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape 14). Until the grapple ends, the target has the Blinded|XPHB and Restrained|XPHB conditions, and it takes 10 (3d6) Lightning damage at the start of each of its turns. When the shambling mound moves, the Grappled|XPHB target moves with it, costing it no extra movement. The shambling mound can have only one creature Grappled|XPHB by this action at a time.

Bound.name: Bound
Bound.description: The guardian is magically bound to an amulet. While the guardian and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the guardian to travel to it, and the guardian knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the guardian is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (round up) is transferred to the guardian.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The guardian regains 10 Hit Points|XPHB at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point.

SpellStoring.name: Spell Storing
SpellStoring.description: A spellcaster who wears the guardian's amulet can cause the guardian to store one spell of level 4 or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the guardian while within 5 feet of it. The spell has no effect but is stored within the guardian. Any previously stored spell is lost when a new spell is stored. The guardian can cast the spell stored with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no spell components and using the caster's spellcasting ability. The stored spell is then lost.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The guardian makes two Fist attacks.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: m 7, reach 10 ft. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Force damage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the shrieker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 6, reach 5 ft. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Piercing damage.

ColdBreath{@recharge5}.description: con DC 13, each creature in a 15-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 18 (4d8) Cold damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

ParalyzingBreath.name: ParalyzingBreath
ParalyzingBreath.description: con DC 13, each creature in a 15-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. 1 The target has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition until the end of its next turn, when it repeats the save. 2 The target has the Paralyzed|XPHB condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword

Shortbow.description: r 5, range 80/320 ft. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

MagicResistance.description: The slaad has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Bite.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst

Claw.name: Claw

ExaltedRestoration.name: Exalted Restoration
ExaltedRestoration.description: If the solar dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points|XPHB somewhere in Mount Celestia.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the solar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

FlyingSword.description: m,r 15, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft. on hit: 22 (4d6 + 8) Slashing damage plus 36 (8d8) Radiant damage. {@hom}The sword magically returns to the solar's hand or hovers within 5 feet of the solar immediately after a ranged attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the specter has Disadvantage|XPHB on ability checks and attack rolls.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

HandCrossbow.description: r 4, range 30/120 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

SteamBreath{@recharge}.name: SteamBreath{@recharge}
SteamBreath{@recharge}.description: con DC 10, each creature in a 15-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 5 (2d4) Fire damage, and the target's Speed|XPHB decreases by 10 feet until the end of the mephit's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} Being underwater doesn't grant Resistance|XPHB to this Fire damage.

Proboscis.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage, and the stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the stirge can't make Proboscis attacks, and the target takes 5 (2d4) Necrotic damage at the start of each of the stirge's turns.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance

ForceBolt.description: r 9, range 120 ft. on hit: 22 (4d10) Force damage.

Amphibious.description: The giant can breathe air and water.

StormSword.description: m 14, reach 10 ft. on hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) Slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) Lightning damage.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: If the swarm has a Climb Speed|XPHB, the swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Swarm.name: Swarm

Bites.name: Bites

LegendaryResistance(6/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(6/Day).description: If the tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The tarrasque has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

ReflectiveCarapace.name: Reflective Carapace
ReflectiveCarapace.description: If the tarrasque is targeted by a Magic Missile|XPHB spell or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll 1d6. On a 1-5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected and reflects the spell, turning the caster into the target.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The tarrasque deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tarrasque makes one Bite attack and three other attacks, using Claw or Tail in any combination.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 19, reach 15 ft. on hit: 36 (4d12 + 10) Piercing damage, and the target has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 20). Until the grapple ends, the target has the Restrained|XPHB condition and can't teleport.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 19, reach 15 ft. on hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) Slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: m 19, reach 30 ft. on hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

ThunderousBellow{@recharge5}.name: ThunderousBellow{@recharge5}
ThunderousBellow{@recharge5}.description: con DC 27, each creature and each object that isn't being worn or carried in a 150-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 78 (12d12) Thunder damage, and the target has the Deafened|XPHB and Frightened|XPHB conditions until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

ChameleonCarapace.name: Chameleon Carapace
ChameleonCarapace.description: The thri-kreen can change the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings. As a result, it has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The thri-kreen's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The thri-kreen makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned in this way. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The thug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The thug makes two melee attacks.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The treant makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: m 10, reach 5 ft. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

HailofBark.name: HailofBark
HailofBark.description: r 10, range 180 ft. on hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) Piercing damage.

AnimateTrees(1/Day).name: AnimateTrees(1/Day)
AnimateTrees(1/Day).description: The treant magically animates up to two trees it can see within 60 feet of itself. Each tree uses the Treant stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, it can't speak, and it lacks this action. The tree takes its turn immediately after the treant on the same Initiative|XPHB count, and it obeys the treant. A tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies, the treant dies, or it is more than 120 feet from the treant. The tree then takes root if possible.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The triceratops makes two Gore attacks.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: m 9, reach 5 ft. on hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) Piercing damage. If the target is Huge or smaller and the triceratops moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) Piercing damage and has the Prone|XPHB condition.

AxiomaticMind.name: Axiomatic Mind
AxiomaticMind.description: The tridrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

Disintegration.name: Disintegration
Disintegration.description: If the tridrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tridrone makes three fist attacks or three javelin attacks.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

Stench.description: con DC 12, any creature (other than a troglodyte) that starts its turn in a 5-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the troglodyte. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the start of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to the Stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has Disadvantage|XPHB on ability checks and attack rolls.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage.

LoathsomeLimbs(4/Day).name: Loathsome Limbs
LoathsomeLimbs(4/Day).description: If the troll ends any turn Bloodied|XPHB and took 15+ Slashing damage during that turn, one of the troll's limbs is severed, falls into the troll's space, and becomes a Troll Limb|XMM. The limb acts immediately after the troll's turn. The troll has 1 Exhaustion|XPHB level for each missing limb, and it grows replacement limbs the next time it regains Hit Points|XPHB.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The troll regains 15 Hit Points|XPHB at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes Acid or Fire damage, this trait doesn't function on the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points|XPHB and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The troll makes three Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 7, reach 10 ft. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The blight has Advantage|XPHB on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the blight's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tyrannosaurus makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 10, reach 10 ft. on hit: 33 (4d12 + 7) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 17). While Grappled|XPHB, the target has the Restrained|XPHB condition and can't be targeted by the tyrannosaurus's Tail.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: m 10, reach 15 ft. on hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition.

FiendishRestoration.name: Fiendish Restoration
FiendishRestoration.description: If the ultroloth dies outside Gehenna, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points|XPHB somewhere in Gehenna.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The ultroloth has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ultroloth uses Hypnotic Gaze and makes two Mercurial Whip attacks.

MercurialWhip.name: MercurialWhip
MercurialWhip.description: m 9, reach 15 ft. on hit: 25 (6d6 + 4) Force damage, and the ultroloth can teleport the target up to 10 feet to an unoccupied space the ultroloth can see that isn't in the air.

HypnoticGaze.name: HypnoticGaze
HypnoticGaze.description: wis DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 10 (3d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Stunned|XPHB condition until the start of the ultroloth's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to this ultroloth's Hypnotic Gaze for 24 hours.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The umber hulk can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed|XPHB and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The umber hulk makes three Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: m 8, reach 10 ft. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the unicorn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The unicorn has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The unicorn makes one Hooves attack and one Radiant Horn attack.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

RadiantHorn.name: RadiantHorn
RadiantHorn.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Radiant damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day,or4/DayinLair).description: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MistyEscape.name: Misty Escape
MistyEscape.description: If the vampire drops to 0 Hit Points|XPHB outside its resting place, the vampire uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can't use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack(VampireFormOnly).name: Multiattack(VampireFormOnly)
Multiattack(VampireFormOnly).description: The vampire makes two Grave Strike attacks and uses Bite.

GraveStrike(VampireFormOnly).name: GraveStrike(VampireFormOnly)
GraveStrike(VampireFormOnly).description: m 9, reach 5 ft. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 14) from one of two hands.

Bite(BatorVampireFormOnly).name: Bite(BatorVampireFormOnly)
Bite(BatorVampireFormOnly).description: con DC 17, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or that has the Grappled|XPHB, Incapacitated|XPHB, or Restrained|XPHB condition. {@actSaveFail} 6 (1d4 + 4) Piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points|XPHB equal to that amount. A Humanoid reduced to 0 Hit Points|XPHB by this damage and then buried rises the following sunset as a Vampire Spawn|XMM under the vampire's control.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The vampire makes two Claw attacks and uses Bite.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: m 6, reach 5 ft. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 13) from one of two claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: con DC 14, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or that has the Grappled|XPHB, Incapacitated|XPHB, or Restrained|XPHB condition. {@actSaveFail} 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points|XPHB equal to that amount.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MistyEscape.name: Misty Escape
MistyEscape.description: When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The vampire regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

VampireWeaknesses.name: Vampire Weaknesses
VampireWeaknesses.description: The vampire has the following flaws:

Multiattack(VampireFormOnly).name: Multiattack(VampireFormOnly)
Multiattack(VampireFormOnly).description: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

UnarmedStrike(VampireFormOnly).name: UnarmedStrike(VampireFormOnly)
UnarmedStrike(VampireFormOnly).description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape DC 18).

Bite(BatorVampireFormOnly).name: Bite(BatorVampireFormOnly)
Bite(BatorVampireFormOnly).description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under the vampire's control.

Charm.name: Charm
Charm.description: The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by the vampire. The charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bite attack.

ChildrenoftheNight(1/Day).name: ChildrenoftheNight(1/Day)
ChildrenoftheNight(1/Day).description: The vampire magically calls 2d4 swarms of swarm of bats||bats or swarm of rats||rats, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, the vampire can call 3d6 wolf||wolves instead. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fungus makes two Rotting Touch attacks.

RottingTouch.name: RottingTouch
RottingTouch.description: m 2, reach 10 ft. on hit: 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

DemonicRestoration.name: Demonic Restoration
DemonicRestoration.description: If the vrock dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points|XPHB somewhere in the Abyss.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance

Multiattack.name: Multiattack

Shred.name: Shred

Constrict.description: str DC 15, one Large or smaller creature within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} 28 (7d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape 14), and it has the Restrained|XPHB condition until the grapple ends. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

PoisonSpray{@recharge5}.name: PoisonSpray{@recharge5}
PoisonSpray{@recharge5}.description: con DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone. {@actSaveFail} 21 (6d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the end of the yuan-ti's next turn. While Poisoned|XPHB, the target has the Blinded|XPHB condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The yuan-ti has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The yuan-ti makes two attacks, using Bite or Poison Ray in any combination, and it can use Spellcasting to cast Suggestion|XPHB if available.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

PoisonRay(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: PoisonRay(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
PoisonRay(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: r 5, range 120 ft. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Poison damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The yuan-ti has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The yuan-ti makes two Bite attacks, and it can use Spellcasting to cast Suggestion|XPHB if available.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: m 5, reach 10 ft. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The yuan-ti has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The yuan-ti makes two Poison Burst attacks, and it can use Spellcasting to cast Suggestion|XPHB if available.

PoisonBurst(Yuan-tiFormOnly).name: PoisonBurst(Yuan-tiFormOnly)
PoisonBurst(Yuan-tiFormOnly).description: m,r 5, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Poison damage.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: str DC 13, one Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} 21 (4d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 13), and it has the Restrained|XPHB condition until the grapple ends.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The yuan-ti makes two melee attacks.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Hit Points|XPHB, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit|XPHB. On a successful save, the zombie drops to 1 Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point instead.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: m 3, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) Bludgeoning damage.

InsatiableGreed.name: Insatiable Greed
InsatiableGreed.description: The abhorrent overlord can sense the presence of gold within 1,000 feet of itself. It can determine which location has the greatest amount of gold and can sense the direction to that site. If the gold is being moved, it knows the direction of the movement. It can't locate gold if any thickness of clay or lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between it and the gold.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The abhorrent overlord has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The abhorrent overlord makes two attacks with its claws.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage. The abhorrent overlord regains hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt if the target is a creature.

StormofCrows{@recharge}.name: StormofCrows{@recharge}
StormofCrows{@recharge}.description: The abhorrent overlord conjures a swarm of spectral crows and harpies in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the overlord can see within 120 feet of it. The sphere remains for 1 minute or until the overlord loses concentration (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell), and its area is lightly obscured and difficult terrain||3.

HoldtheLine.name: Hold the Line
HoldtheLine.description: While the hoplite is holding a spear, other creatures provoke an opportunity attack from the hoplite when they move within 5 feet of it. When the hoplite hits a creature with an opportunity attack using its spear, the creature takes an extra 4 (1d8) piercing damage, and the creature's speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hoplite makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

ShieldBash.name: ShieldBash
ShieldBash.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

HideinPlainSight.name: Hide in Plain Sight
HideinPlainSight.description: The alseid has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide while it is in grassland.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The alseid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The alseid makes two radiant touch attacks.

RadiantTouch.name: RadiantTouch
RadiantTouch.description: ms 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) radiant damage.

KeenSight.name: Keen Sight
KeenSight.description: The raptor has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

RecordedMimicry.name: Recorded Mimicry
RecordedMimicry.description: The raptor can mimic any sound, including voices, it has heard in the last 24 hours. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Insight) check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The raptor makes two attacks with its beak.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If Aphemia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Aphemia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Aphemia makes two attacks: one with her bite and one with her claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

DiscordantSong.name: DiscordantSong
DiscordantSong.description: Aphemia shrieks a cacophony of magical sounds. Each humanoid within 120 feet of her must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of her until the song ends. A frightened creature takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage at the start of its turn while Aphemia is singing. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Aphemia's Discordant Song for the next 24 hours. Aphemia must take a bonus action on her subsequent turns to continue singing. She can stop singing at any time. The song ends if Aphemia is incapacitated or dies.

GraveCallingSong.name: GraveCallingSong
GraveCallingSong.description: Aphemia intones a low, growling magical melody. Every undead within 300 feet of her must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or fall under her control until the song ends. Aphemia must take a bonus action on her subsequent turns to continue singing, and she can mentally command the undead under her control as part of the same bonus action. She can stop singing at any time. The song ends if Aphemia is incapacitated or dies.

ArmorofSpiders(MythicTrait;Rechargesafte.name: Armor of Spiders (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
ArmorofSpiders(MythicTrait;Rechargesafte.description: If Arasta is reduced to 0 hit points, she doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, she regains 200 hit points. In addition, Arasta's children immediately swarm over her body to protect her, granting her 100 temporary hit points.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Arasta fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Arasta has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: Arasta can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: Arasta ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Arasta makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw, taking 32 (5d12) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) slashing damage.

WebofHair{@recharge4}.name: WebofHair{@recharge4}
WebofHair{@recharge4}.description: Arasta unleashes her hair in the form of webbing that fills a 30-foot cube next to her. The web is difficult terrain||3, its area is lightly obscured, and it lasts for 1 minute. Any creature that moves into the web or that starts its turn there must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is restrained while in the web. A creature can use an action to make a DC 21 Strength check. On a success, it can free itself or a creature within 5 feet of it that is restrained by the web. This webbing is immune to all damage except magical fire. A 5-foot cube of the web is destroyed if it takes at least 20 fire damage from a spell or other magical source on a single turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Mount.name: Mount
Mount.description: If the archon isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the archon and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the archon appears astride the mount, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the archon can't be surprised, and both it and its mount have advantage on Dexterity saving throws. If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

RadiantRebirth(RechargesafteraLongRest).name: Radiant Rebirth (Recharges after a Long Rest)
RadiantRebirth(RechargesafteraLongRest).description: If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points, it regains 30 hit points and springs back to its feet with a burst of radiance. Each creature of the archon's choice within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, or the creature takes 13 (3d8) radiant damage and is blinded until the start of the archon's turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The archon makes two attacks with its radiant spear.

RadiantSpear.name: RadiantSpear
RadiantSpear.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

AuraofSilence.name: Aura of Silence
AuraofSilence.description: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the ashen rider, the rider can force that creature to make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw if the rider can see it. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature can't speak and is deafened until the start of its next turn.

Mount.name: Mount
Mount.description: If the ashen rider isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the ashen rider and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the ashen rider appears astride the mount along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ashen rider makes three attacks with its ashen blade or two attacks with its bolt of ash.

AshenBlade.name: AshenBlade
AshenBlade.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 13 (2d12) radiant damage.

BoltofAsh.name: BoltofAsh
BoltofAsh.description: rs 10 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 22 (4d10) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the ashen rider's next turn.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The harpy has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

DarkDevotion.name: Dark Devotion
DarkDevotion.description: The harpy has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The harpy makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If Antigonos moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

LabyrinthineRecall.name: Labyrinthine Recall
LabyrinthineRecall.description: Antigonos can perfectly recall any path he has traveled.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of his turn, Antigonos can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls he makes during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

DecrepitState.name: Decrepit State
DecrepitState.description: Antigonos has disadvantage on his attack rolls.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

Amphora.name: Amphora
Amphora.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If there is not already a creature inside the amphora, the target is restrained inside. As an action, the restrained creature can make a DC 14 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check, escaping from the amphora on a success. The effect also ends if the amphora is destroyed. The amphora has AC 8, 20 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the sable remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The sable has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sable's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

SurpriseAttack.name: Surprise Attack
SurpriseAttack.description: If the sable surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sable makes two bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the hart moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

HeatedBody.name: Heated Body
HeatedBody.description: A creature that touches the hart or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage.

Sure-Footed.name: Sure-Footed
Sure-Footed.description: The hart has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hart makes two attacks: one with its antlers and one with its hooves.

Antlers.name: Antlers
Antlers.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.
